app_descript:
Petrol Spy Australia

Brief:

Petrol Spy Australia is the go-to mobile application for Australian residents or travelers looking to find the best fuel prices across the country. Whether in New South Wales or Western Australia, users can access up-to-date prices and a comprehensive list of fuel station locations. Its database encompasses major chains and independent operators, ensuring you're never far from a fuel-saving opportunity.
